shell

package shell

  1. Public

Type Members

  1. class De10Config extends Config

    De10Config.

    De10Config. Shell configuration for De10

  2. class F1Config extends Config

    F1Config.

    F1Config. Shell configuration for F1

  3. class IntelShell extends Module

    IntelShell.

    IntelShell.

    The IntelShell is based on a VME, VCR and core. This creates a complete VTA system that can be used for simulation or real hardware.

  4. class PynqConfig extends Config

    PynqConfig.

    PynqConfig. Shell configuration for Pynq

  5. case class ShellParams(hostParams: AXIParams, memParams: AXIParams, vcrParams: VCRParams, vmeParams: VMEParams) extends Product with Serializable

    Shell parameters.

  6. class SimShell extends MultiIOModule

    SimShell.

    SimShell.

    The simulation shell instantiate the sim, host and memory DPI modules that are connected to the VTAShell. An extra clock, sim_clock, is used to eval the VTASim DPI function when the main simulation clock is on halt state.

  7. class VCR extends Module

    VTA Control Registers (VCR).

    VTA Control Registers (VCR).

    This unit provides control registers (32 and 64 bits) to be used by a control' unit, typically a host processor. These registers are read-only by the core at the moment but this will likely change once we add support to general purpose registers that could be used as event counters by the Core unit.

  8. abstract class VCRBase extends GenericParameterizedBundle[Parameters]

    VCRBase.

    VCRBase. Parametrize base class.

  9. class VCRClient extends VCRBase

    VCRClient.

    VCRClient.

    This is the client interface used by the Core module to communicate to the VCR in the VTAShell.

  10. class VCRMaster extends VCRBase

    VCRMaster.

    VCRMaster.

    This is the master interface used by VCR in the VTAShell to control the Core unit.

  11. case class VCRParams() extends Product with Serializable

    VCR parameters.

    VCR parameters.

    These parameters are used on VCR interfaces and modules.

  12. class VME extends Module

    VTA Memory Engine (VME).

    VTA Memory Engine (VME).

    This unit multiplexes the memory controller interface for the Core. Currently, it supports single-writer and multiple-reader mode and it is also based on AXI.

  13. abstract class VMEBase extends GenericParameterizedBundle[Parameters]

    VMEBase.

    VMEBase. Parametrize base class.

  14. class VMEClient extends Bundle

    VMEClient.

    VMEClient.

    Pack nRd number of VMEReadClient interfaces and nWr number of VMEWriteClient interfaces.

  15. class VMECmd extends VMEBase

    VMECmd.

    VMECmd.

    This interface is used for creating write and read requests to memory.

  16. class VMEMaster extends Bundle

    VMEMaster.

    VMEMaster.

    Pack nRd number of VMEReadMaster interfaces and nWr number of VMEWriteMaster interfaces.

  17. case class VMEParams() extends Product with Serializable

    VME parameters.

    VME parameters.

    These parameters are used on VME interfaces and modules.

  18. class VMEReadClient extends Bundle

    VMEReadClient.

    VMEReadClient.

    This interface is used by the VME to receive read requests and generate responses to modules inside the core.

  19. class VMEReadMaster extends Bundle

    VMEReadMaster.

    VMEReadMaster.

    This interface is used by modules inside the core to generate read requests and receive responses from VME.

  20. class VMEWriteClient extends Bundle

    VMEWriteClient.

    VMEWriteClient.

    This interface is used by the VME to handle write requests from modules inside the core.

  21. class VMEWriteMaster extends Bundle

    VMEWriteMaster.

    VMEWriteMaster.

    This interface is used by modules inside the core to generate write requests to the VME.

  22. class VTAHost extends Module

    VTAHost.

    VTAHost.

    This module translate the DPI protocol into AXI. This is a simulation only module and used to test host-to-VTA communication. This module should be updated for testing hosts using a different bus protocol, other than AXI.

  23. class VTAMem extends Module

    VTAMem.

    VTAMem.

    This module translate the DPI protocol into AXI. This is a simulation only module and used to test VTA-to-memory communication. This module should be updated for testing memories using a different bus protocol, other than AXI.

  24. class VTAShell extends Module

    VTAShell.

    VTAShell.

    The VTAShell is based on a VME, VCR and core. This creates a complete VTA system that can be used for simulation or real hardware.

  25. class VTASim extends MultiIOModule

    VTASim.

    VTASim.

    This module is used to handle hardware simulation thread, such as halting or terminating the simulation thread. The sim_wait port is used to halt the simulation thread when it is asserted and resume it when it is de-asserted.

  26. class XilinxShell extends RawModule

    XilinxShell.

    XilinxShell.

    This is a wrapper shell mostly used to match Xilinx convention naming, therefore we can pack VTA as an IP for IPI based flows.
